Member Function Documentation

static VideoEditor gaia::media::VideoEditorFactory::create ( const base::String &  projectPath) [static]

This is the factory method for creating a new VideoEditor instance.

Parameters:
projectPathThe path where all VideoEditor internal files are stored. When a project is deleted the application is responsible for deleting the path and its contents.
Returns:
The VideoEditor instance
static VideoEditor gaia::media::VideoEditorFactory::load ( const base::String &  projectPath,
bool  generatePreview 
) [static]

This is the factory method for instantiating a VideoEditor from the internal state previously saved with the VideoEditor#save(String) method.

Parameters:
projectPathThe path where all VideoEditor internal files are stored. When a project is deleted the application is responsible for deleting the path and its contents.
generatePreviewif set to true the listener) will be called internally to generate any needed transitions.
Returns:
The VideoEditor instance
